oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthesis and antioxidant properties of novel alpha-tocopherol glycoconjugates
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SINGH, AK
GOPU, K
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: vitamin-e
click chemistry
oxidation
clusters
analogs
alpha-tocopherol
vitamin e
glycoconjugates
click chemistry
antioxidants
radioproctants
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Glycoconjugates of alpha-tocopherol (1), synthesized using click chemistry between alpha-tocopherol-azide and glyco-alkynes are solids, have enhanced water solubility and exhibit radical-scavenging activities comparable to 1, as determined by DPPH and lipid peroxidation assay methods. (C) 2009
